pylabcontrol.scripts.script_dummy module¶

class pylabcontrol.scripts.script_dummy.DummyPlantWithControler(instruments, scripts=None, name=None, settings=None, log_function=None, data_path=None)[source]¶

Bases: pylabcontrol.core.scripts.Script

script to bring the detector response to zero two channels are set to a fixed voltage while the signal of the third channel is varied until the detector response is zero

Example Script that has all different types of parameters (integer, str, fload, point, list of parameters). Plots 1D and 2D data.

pylabcontrol.scripts.script_wait module¶

class pylabcontrol.scripts.script_wait.Wait(instruments=None, scripts=None, name=None, settings=None, log_function=None, data_path=None)[source]¶

Bases: pylabcontrol.core.scripts.Script

Script that waits. This is useful to execute scripts in a loop at given intervals. There are two modes of operation:

wait_mode = absolute: the script waits the time defined in wait_time wait_mode = loop_interval: the script waits as long such that the loop time equals the time defined in wait_time

pylabcontrol.scripts.select_points module¶

class pylabcontrol.scripts.select_points.SelectPoints(instruments=None, scripts=None, name=None, settings=None, log_function=None, data_path=None)[source]¶

Bases: pylabcontrol.core.scripts.Script

Script to select points on an image. The selected points are saved and can be used in a superscript to iterate over.

plot(figure_list)[source]¶

Plots a dot on top of each selected NV, with a corresponding number denoting the order in which the NVs are listed. Precondition: must have an existing image in figure_list[0] to plot over :param figure_list:

toggle_NV(pt)[source]¶

If there is not currently a selected NV within self.settings[patch_size] of pt, adds it to the selected list. If there is, removes that point from the selected list. :param pt: the point to add or remove from the selected list

Poststate: updates selected list
